email_body: ---------------------- Forwarded by Phillip K Allen/HOU/ECT on 03/22/2000 01:46 PM --------------------------- From: Colleen Sullivan 03/22/2000 08:42 AM To: Hunter S Shively/HOU/ECT@ECT, Phillip K Allen/HOU/ECT@ECT, Scott Neal/HOU/ECT@ECT, Thomas A Martin/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Bhavna Pandya/HOU/ECT@ECT Subject: Meeting-THURSDAY, MARCH 23 - 11:15 AM Please plan on attending a meeting on Thursday, March 23 at 11:15 am in Room 3127. This meeting will be brief. I would like to take the time to introduce Bhavna Pandya, and get some input from you on various projects she will be assisting us with. Thank you.
